source: A qasidah (suluk) authored by Imam Abdullah bin Alawi al-Haddad, famously recited in the modern gatherings of Habib Umar bin Hafidz and Majelis Rasulullah.
name: فَحَمْدًا لِرَبٍّ

1.arabic: فَحَمْدًا لِرَبٍّ خَصَّنَا بِمُحَمَّدٍ ۞ وَأَخْرَجَنَا مِنْ ظُلْمَةٍ وَدَيَاجِرِي
1.latin: Fa ḥamdan li-Rabbin khaṣṣanā bi-Muḥammadin ۞ wa akhrajanā min ẓulmatin wa dayājirī

2.arabic: إِلَى نُوْرِ إِسْلَامٍ وَعِلْمٍ وَحِكْمَةٍ ۞ وَيُمْNٍ وَإِيْمَانٍ وَخَيْرِ الْأَوَAMRِ
2.latin: Ilā nūri Islāmin wa ‘ilmin wa ḥikmatin ۞ wa yumnin wa īmānin wa khairil-awāmiri

3.arabic: وَطَهَّرَنَا مِنْ رِجْسٍ كُفْرٍ وَخُبْثِهِ ۞ وَشِرْكٍ وَظُلْمٍ وَاقْتِحَامِ الْكَبَائِرِ
3.latin: Wa ṭahharanā min rijsin kufrin wa khubthihi ۞ wa syirkin wa ẓulmin wa-qtiḥāmil-kabā'iri

4.arabic: أَتَى بِكِTābillāhi yatlūhu dā‘iyan ۞ ilallāhi bil-ḥusnā wa khairil-basyā'iri
4.latin: Atā bi-kitābillāhi yatlūhu dā‘iyan ۞ ilallāhi bil-ḥusnā wa khairil-basyā'iri

text.1: All praise is due to the Lord who specified us with Muhammad ۞ And brought us out from darkness and gloom.
text.2: To the light of Islam, knowledge, and wisdom ۞ And blessing, faith, and the best of commands.
text.3: And He purified us from the filth of disbelief and its wickedness ۞ And from polytheism, oppression, and the commission of major sins.
text.4: He (the Prophet) came with the Book of Allah, reciting it, calling ۞ to Allah in the best (manner) and with the best of glad tidings.

text.1: Segala puji bagi Tuhan yang mengkhususkan kita dengan Muhammad ۞ Dan mengeluarkan kita dari kegelapan dan kekelaman.
text.2: Menuju cahaya Islam, ilmu, dan hikmah ۞ Serta keberkahan, iman, dan sebaik-baik perintah.
text.3: Dan Dia menyucikan kita dari kotoran kekafiran dan kebusukannya ۞ Serta dari syirik, kezaliman, dan perbuatan dosa-dosa besar.
text.4: Dia (Nabi) datang dengan Kitab Allah, membacanya, menyeru ۞ kepada Allah dengan (cara) yang terbaik dan sebaik-baik kabar gembira.
